# Problem 1

```{r data frame}
library(tidyverse)
sed.seed = 777
rs = runif(10, 0, 5)
df = tibble(
  rs,
  vec_logical = rs>2,
  vec_character = c("usa", "canada", "france", "england", "japan", "sweden", "korea", "germany", "italy", "austria"),
  vec_factor = c("M", "M", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F")
)
#print df
df
#mean of variables in dataframe
mean(df$rs)
mean(df$vec_logical)
mean(df$vec_character)
mean(df$vec_factor)
```
